vulnerabilities.title: Sentry SDK Prototype Pollution gadget in JavaScript SDKs
vulnerabilities.description:
### Impact
In case a Prototype Pollution vulnerability is present in a user's application or bundled libraries, the Sentry SDK could potentially serve as a gadget to exploit that vulnerability. The exploitability depends on the specific details of the underlying Prototype Pollution issue.

> [!NOTE]
> This advisory does not indicate the presence of a Prototype Pollution within the Sentry SDK itself. Users are strongly advised to first address any Prototype Pollution vulnerabilities in their appl
